emuInput.TitMainTitle: Two women and man behind rope of Philip Morris, Inc. booth, with Tip Top Bakers booth on right, at 1963 Pittsburgh Courier - WAMO, Home-A-Rama fair, Syria Mosque, another version
emuInput.CatDescriptText: Cutline of related image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, June 15, 1963, pg. 15, reads: "The 1963 Courier-WAMO Home-A-Rama. Pittsburgh's only home and food show, opened before a huge throng last Thursday, June 6, at the spacious Syria Mosque in Oakland..."
